column2: Over this decade, the EU will need to install, on average, approximately 45 GW per year of PV to reach the share of 45% of energy coming from renewables set out in the RePowerEU Plan
column5: This target is assigned to the Solar Energy sub-theme because it specifically mentions the installation of PV, which is a key aspect of solar energy. The target's focus on increasing the share of energy from renewables also aligns with the broader goals of the Solar Energy sub-theme.

column2: Member States shall collectively ensure that the share of energy from renewable sources in the Union’s gross final consumption of energy in 2030 is at least 42,5 %
column5: This target is assigned to the Renewable Energy sub-theme because it sets a specific goal for increasing the share of energy from renewable sources in the EU's energy consumption. The target's focus on renewable energy aligns with the broader goals of the Renewable Energy sub-theme.

column2: Member States shall set an indicative target for innovative renewable energy technology of at least 5 % of newly installed renewable energy capacity by 2030
column5: This target is assigned to the Innovative Renewable Energy sub-theme because it specifically mentions innovative renewable energy technology. The target's focus on increasing the share of innovative renewable energy technology aligns with the broader goals of the Innovative Renewable Energy sub-theme.

column2: Member States shall endeavour to increase the share of energy from renewable sources and from waste heat and cold in district heating and cooling by an indicative 2,2 percentage points as an annual average calculated for the period 2021 to 2030, starting from the share of energy from renewable sources and from waste heat and cold in district heating and cooling in 2020
column5: This target is assigned to the District Heating and Cooling sub-theme because it specifically mentions district heating and cooling. The target's focus on increasing the share of energy from renewable sources in district heating and cooling aligns with the broader goals of the District Heating and Cooling sub-theme.

column2: Renovate each year at least 3% of the total floor area of buildings owned by all levels of public administration (as also agreed by Council-Parliament on 10.03.23)
column5: This target is assigned to the Building Renovation sub-theme because it specifically mentions renovating buildings. The target's focus on increasing the energy efficiency of buildings aligns with the broader goals of the Building Renovation sub-theme.

column2: All existing buildings should be transformed into zero-emission buildings
column5: This target is assigned to the Zero-Emission Buildings sub-theme because it specifically mentions transforming buildings into zero-emission buildings. The target's focus on reducing greenhouse gas emissions from buildings aligns with the broader goals of the Zero-Emission Buildings sub-theme.

column2: The national measures will have to ensure that at least 55% of the decrease of the average primary energy use is achieved through the renovation of the worst-performing buildings
column5: This target is assigned to the Building Renovation sub-theme because it specifically mentions renovating buildings. The target's focus on increasing the energy efficiency of buildings aligns with the broader goals of the Building Renovation sub-theme.

column2: The strategy sets targets for an installed capacity of at least 60 GW of offshore wind by 2030 and at least 300 GW by 2050
column5: This target is assigned to the Offshore Wind sub-theme because it specifically mentions offshore wind. The target's focus on increasing the installed capacity of offshore wind aligns with the broader goals of the Offshore Wind sub-theme.

column2: The strategy sets targets for an installed capacity of at least 1 GW of ocean energy by 2030 and 40 GW by 2050
column5: This target is assigned to the Ocean Energy sub-theme because it specifically mentions ocean energy. The target's focus on increasing the installed capacity of ocean energy aligns with the broader goals of the Ocean Energy sub-theme.

column2: Halve the amount of residual (non-recycled) municipal waste
column3: TA3_Industrial strategy for a clean and circular economy
column5: This target is assigned to the Waste Reduction sub-theme because it specifically mentions reducing municipal waste. The target's focus on reducing waste aligns with the broader goals of the Waste Reduction sub-theme.

column2: By 2030 textile products placed on the EU market are long-lived and recyclable, to a great extent made of recycled fibres, free of hazardous substances and produced in respect of social rights and the environment
column3: TA3_Industrial strategy for a clean and circular economy
column5: This target is assigned to the Sustainable Textiles sub-theme because it specifically mentions textile products. The target's focus on making textile products more sustainable aligns with the broader goals of the Sustainable Textiles sub-theme.

column2: by 2030, manufacturing capacity in the Union of the strategic net-zero technologies listed in the Annex approaches or reaches a benchmark of at least 40% of the Union’s annual deployment needs for the corresponding technologies necessary to achieve the Union’s 2030 climate and energy targets
column3: TA3_Industrial strategy for a clean and circular economy
column5: This target is assigned to the Net-Zero Technologies sub-theme because it specifically mentions net-zero technologies. The target's focus on increasing the manufacturing capacity of net-zero technologies aligns with the broader goals of the Net-Zero Technologies sub-theme.

column2: Recycling shall achieve at least the following targets for recycling efficiency: No later than 31 December 2025 - 75% by average weight of lead-acid batteries, - 80% by average weight of nickel-cadmium batteries - 50% by average weight of other waste batteries No later than 31 December 2030 - 80% by average weight of lead-acid batteries
column3: TA3_Industrial strategy for a clean and circular economy
column5: This target is assigned to the Battery Recycling sub-theme because it specifically mentions recycling batteries. The target's focus on increasing the recycling efficiency of batteries aligns with the broader goals of the Battery Recycling sub-theme.

column2: All recycling shall achieve at least the following targets for recovery of materials: No later than 31 December 2027 - 50% lithium No later than 31 December 2031: - 80% lithium
column3: TA3_Industrial strategy for a clean and circular economy
column5: This target is assigned to the Material Recovery sub-theme because it specifically mentions recovering materials. The target's focus on increasing the recovery of materials aligns with the broader goals of the Material Recovery sub-theme.

column2: From 2025, beverage bottles listed in Part F of the Annex which are manufactured from polyethylene terephthalate as the major component (‘PET bottles’) contain at least 25 % recycled plastic, calculated as an average for all PET bottles placed on the market on the territory of that Member State
column3: TA3_Industrial strategy for a clean and circular economy
column5: This target is assigned to the Plastic Recycling sub-theme because it specifically mentions recycling plastic. The target's focus on increasing the use of recycled plastic in beverage bottles aligns with the broader goals of the Plastic Recycling sub-theme.

column2: From 15 August 2018, the recovery targets for the WEEE falling within the following categories of Annex III shall be: - 85% for Category 1 (temperature exchange equipment) or Category 4 (large equipment with any external dimension more than 50 cm) - 80% for Category 2 (e.g., screens and monitors) - 75% for Category 5 (small equipment with no external dimension more than 50 cm) or 6 (Small IT and telecommunication equipment with no external dimension more than 50 cm)
column3: TA3_Industrial strategy for a clean and circular economy
column5: This target is assigned to the Electronic Waste Recycling sub-theme because it specifically mentions recycling electronic waste. The target's focus on increasing the recovery of electronic waste aligns with the broader goals of the Electronic Waste Recycling sub-theme.

column2: From 15 August 2018, the preparation for re-use targets for the WEEE falling within the following categories of Annex III shall be: - 80% for Category 1 or Category 4 - 70% for Category 2 - 55% for Category 5 or Category 6
column3: TA3_Industrial strategy for a clean and circular economy
column5: This target is assigned to the Electronic Waste Reuse sub-theme because it specifically mentions reusing electronic waste. The target's focus on increasing the preparation for reuse of electronic waste aligns with the broader goals of the Electronic Waste Reuse sub-theme.

column2: From 15 August 2018, the recycling targets for the WEEE falling within the following categories of Annex III shall be: - 0% for Category 1 or Category 4 - 70% for Category 2 - 55% for Category 5 or Category 6
column3: TA3_Industrial strategy for a clean and circular economy
column5: This target is assigned to the Electronic Waste Recycling sub-theme because it specifically mentions recycling electronic waste. The target's focus on increasing the recycling of electronic waste aligns with the broader goals of the Electronic Waste Recycling sub-theme.

column2: Member States with maritime ports should endeavour to ensure that from 2030 the share of renewable fuels of non-biological origin in the total amount of energy supplied to the maritime transport sector is at least 1,2 %
column5: This target is assigned to the Maritime Transport sub-theme because it specifically mentions maritime transport. The target's focus on increasing the use of renewable fuels in maritime transport aligns with the broader goals of the Maritime Transport sub-theme.

column2: Reduce the average door-to-door cost of combined transport operations by at least 10% within 7 years
column5: This target is assigned to the Transport Efficiency sub-theme because it specifically mentions reducing transport costs. The target's focus on increasing transport efficiency aligns with the broader goals of the Transport Efficiency sub-theme.

column2: In a third phase, from 2030 onwards and towards 2050, renewable hydrogen technologies should reach maturity and be deployed at large scale to reach all hard-to-decarbonise sectors where other alternatives might not be feasible or have higher costs
column5: This target is assigned to the Hydrogen Transport sub-theme because it specifically mentions renewable hydrogen technologies. The target's focus on deploying hydrogen transport aligns with the broader goals of the Hydrogen Transport sub-theme.

column2: By 31 December 2030 (with intermediate 2025 and 2027 targets), along the TEN-T core road network, publicly accessible recharging pools dedicated to heavy-duty electric vehicles are deployed in each direction of travel with a maximum distance of 60 km between them
column5: This target is assigned to the Electric Vehicle Charging sub-theme because it specifically mentions recharging pools for electric vehicles. The target's focus on increasing the deployment of electric vehicle charging infrastructure aligns with the broader goals of the Electric Vehicle Charging sub-theme.

column2: By 31 December 2030, in each urban node publicly accessible recharging points dedicated to heavy-duty electric vehicles with an aggregated power output of at least 1 800 kW are deployed, provided by recharging stations with an individual power output of at least 150 kW
column5: This target is assigned to the Electric Vehicle Charging sub-theme because it specifically mentions recharging points for electric vehicles. The target's focus on increasing the deployment of electric vehicle charging infrastructure aligns with the broader goals of the Electric Vehicle Charging sub-theme.

column2: Member States shall ensure that by 31 December 2030 publicly accessible hydrogen refuelling stations designed for a minimum cumulative capacity of 1 tonne per day and equipped with at least a 700 bar dispenser are deployed with a maximum distance of 200 km between them along the TEN-T core network
column5: This target is assigned to the Hydrogen Refuelling sub-theme because it specifically mentions hydrogen refuelling stations. The target's focus on increasing the deployment of hydrogen refuelling infrastructure aligns with the broader goals of the Hydrogen Refuelling sub-theme.

column2: Member States shall ensure that at least one installation providing shore-side electricity supply to inland waterway vessels is deployed at all TEN-T core inland waterway ports by 1 January 2025, at least one installation providing shore-side electricity supply to inland waterway vessels is deployed at all TEN-T comprehensive inland waterway ports by 1 January 2030
column5: This target is assigned to the Inland Waterway Transport sub-theme because it specifically mentions inland waterway vessels. The target's focus on increasing the use of shore-side electricity supply in inland waterway transport aligns with the broader goals of the Inland Waterway Transport sub-theme.

column2: Member States shall ensure that a minimum shore-side electricity supply for seagoing container ships and seagoing passenger ships is provided in TEN-T maritime ports
column5: This target is assigned to the Maritime Transport sub-theme because it specifically mentions maritime transport. The target's focus on increasing the use of shore-side electricity supply in maritime transport aligns with the broader goals of the Maritime Transport sub-theme.

column2: There will be at least 30 million zero-emission cars and 80.000 zero-emission lorries in operation
column5: This target is assigned to the Zero-Emission Vehicles sub-theme because it specifically mentions zero-emission cars and lorries. The target's focus on increasing the number of zero-emission vehicles aligns with the broader goals of the Zero-Emission Vehicles sub-theme.

column2: Increase sustainable fishing and aquaculture
column3: TA5_Greening the Common Agricultural Policy - Farm to Fork Strategy
column5: This target is assigned to the Sustainable Fishing sub-theme because it specifically mentions sustainable fishing. The target's focus on increasing sustainable fishing practices aligns with the broader goals of the Sustainable Fishing sub-theme.

column2: Reduce food waste
column3: TA5_Greening the Common Agricultural Policy - Farm to Fork Strategy
column5: This target is assigned to the Food Waste Reduction sub-theme because it specifically mentions reducing food waste. The target's focus on reducing food waste aligns with the broader goals of the Food Waste Reduction sub-theme.

column2: Reduce the environmental and climate footprint of the EU food system, operating within planetary boundaries
column3: TA5_Greening the Common Agricultural Policy - Farm to Fork Strategy
column5: This target is assigned to the Sustainable Food Systems sub-theme because it specifically mentions reducing the environmental and climate footprint of the food system. The target's focus on increasing the sustainability of food systems aligns with the broader goals of the Sustainable Food Systems sub-theme.

column2: Help farmers and fishers to strengthen their position in the supply chain and to capture a fair share of the added value of sustainable production
column3: TA5_Greening the Common Agricultural Policy - Farm to Fork Strategy
column5: This target is assigned to the Sustainable Agriculture sub-theme because it specifically mentions sustainable production. The target's focus on increasing the sustainability of agricultural practices aligns with the broader goals of the Sustainable Agriculture sub-theme.

column2: Create shorter supply chains will support reducing dependence on long-haul transportation
column3: TA5_Greening the Common Agricultural Policy - Farm to Fork Strategy
column5: This target is assigned to the Supply Chain Optimization sub-theme because it specifically mentions creating shorter supply chains. The target's focus on optimizing supply chains aligns with the broader goals of the Supply Chain Optimization sub-theme.

column2: Improve availability of sustainable food
column3: TA5_Greening the Common Agricultural Policy - Farm to Fork Strategy
column5: This target is assigned to the Sustainable Food Systems sub-theme because it specifically mentions improving the availability of sustainable food. The target's focus on increasing the availability of sustainable food aligns with the broader goals of the Sustainable Food Systems sub-theme.

column2: Ensure affordability and access to sufficient, nutritious and sustainable food
column3: TA5_Greening the Common Agricultural Policy - Farm to Fork Strategy
column5: This target is assigned to the Sustainable Food Systems sub-theme because it specifically mentions ensuring access to sustainable food. The target's focus on increasing access to sustainable food aligns with the broader goals of the Sustainable Food Systems sub-theme.

column2: Reverse prevalence of overweight and diet-related diseases
column3: TA5_Greening the Common Agricultural Policy - Farm to Fork Strategy
column5: This target is assigned to the Public Health sub-theme because it specifically mentions reversing the prevalence of overweight and diet-related diseases. The target's focus on improving public health aligns with the broader goals of the Public Health sub-theme.

column2: Effectively manage all protected areas, defining clear conservation objectives and measures, and monitoring them appropriately
column5: This target is assigned to the Protected Areas Management sub-theme because it specifically mentions managing protected areas. The target's focus on effectively managing protected areas aligns with the broader goals of the Protected Areas Management sub-theme.

column2: The risk and use of chemical pesticides is reduced by 50%, and the use of more hazardous pesticides is reduced by 50% (target partially in common with the Farm to Fork Strategy)
column5: This target is assigned to the Sustainable Pest Management sub-theme because it specifically mentions reducing the use of chemical pesticides. The target's focus on increasing sustainable pest management practices aligns with the broader goals of the Sustainable Pest Management sub-theme.

column2: There is a 50% reduction in the number of Red List species threatened by invasive alien species
column5: This target is assigned to the Invasive Species Management sub-theme because it specifically mentions reducing the number of Red List species threatened by invasive alien species. The target's focus on managing invasive species aligns with the broader goals of the Invasive Species Management sub-theme.

column2: The by-catch of species is eliminated or reduced to a level that allows species recovery and conservation
column5: This target is assigned to the Sustainable Fishing sub-theme because it specifically mentions reducing by-catch. The target's focus on increasing sustainable fishing practices aligns with the broader goals of the Sustainable Fishing sub-theme.

column2: (terrestrial, coastal and freshwater ecosystems) Member States shall put in place the restoration measures that are necessary to improve to good condition areas of habitat types listed in Annex I which are not in good condition
column5: This target is assigned to the Habitat Restoration sub-theme because it specifically mentions restoring habitats. The target's focus on restoring habitats aligns with the broader goals of the Habitat Restoration sub-theme.

column2: (terrestrial, coastal and freshwater ecosystems) Member States shall put in place the restoration measures for the terrestrial, coastal and freshwater habitats of the species listed in Annexes II, IV and V to Directive 92/43/EEC and of the terrestrial, coastal and freshwater habitats of wild birds covered by Directive 2009/147/EC that are, in addition to the restoration measures in accordance with paragraphs 1 and 2 of this Article, necessary to improve the quality and quantity of those habitats, including by re-establishing them, and to enhance connectivity, until sufficient quality and quantity of those habitats is achieved
column5: This target is assigned to the Habitat Restoration sub-theme because it specifically mentions restoring habitats. The target's focus on restoring habitats aligns with the broader goals of the Habitat Restoration sub-theme.

column2: (terrestrial, coastal and freshwater ecosystems) Member States shall ensure that the condition is known for at least 90% of area distributed overall habitat types listed in Annex I by 2030 and 100% by 2040
column5: This target is assigned to the Habitat Monitoring sub-theme because it specifically mentions monitoring habitats. The target's focus on increasing habitat monitoring aligns with the broader goals of the Habitat Monitoring sub-theme.

column2: Restore degraded land and soil, including land affected by desertification, drought and floods
column5: This target is assigned to the Land Restoration sub-theme because it specifically mentions restoring degraded land and soil. The target's focus on restoring land and soil aligns with the broader goals of the Land Restoration sub-theme.

column2: Improve soil quality by reducing nutrient losses and chemical pesticides’ use by 50% (target partially in common with the Farm to Fork strategy and Biodiversity strategy) - focus on water quality and chemical pesticides
column3: TA7_Towards a zero-pollution ambition for a toxic free environment
column5: This target is assigned to the Soil Quality Improvement sub-theme because it specifically mentions improving soil quality. The target's focus on reducing nutrient losses and chemical pesticides aligns with the broader goals of the Soil Quality Improvement sub-theme.

column2: Improve air quality to reduce the number of premature deaths caused by air pollution by 55%
column3: TA7_Towards a zero-pollution ambition for a toxic free environment
column5: This target is assigned to the Air Quality Improvement sub-theme because it specifically mentions improving air quality. The target's focus on reducing premature deaths caused by air pollution aligns with the broader goals of the Air Quality Improvement sub-theme.

column2: Reduce significantly total waste generation and by 50% residual municipal waste
column3: TA7_Towards a zero-pollution ambition for a toxic free environment
column5: This target is assigned to the Waste Reduction sub-theme because it specifically mentions reducing waste generation. The target's focus on reducing waste aligns with the broader goals of the Waste Reduction sub-theme.

column2: Improve soil quality by reducing nutrient losses and chemical pesticides’ use by 50% (target partially in common with the Farm to Fork strategy and Biodiversity strategy) - focus on water quality and nutrient loss
column3: TA7_Towards a zero-pollution ambition for a toxic free environment
column5: This target is assigned to the Soil Quality Improvement sub-theme because it specifically mentions improving soil quality. The target's focus on reducing nutrient losses and chemical pesticides aligns with the broader goals of the Soil Quality Improvement sub-theme.

column2: The revision of the Ambient Air Quality Directives would merge the Directives into one, and seek to: align EU air quality standards more closely with WHO recommendations further improve the legislative framework (e.g. in relation to penalties, and public information)
column3: TA7_Towards a zero-pollution ambition for a toxic free environment
column5: This target is assigned to the Air Quality Improvement sub-theme because it specifically mentions improving air quality standards. The target's focus on aligning EU air quality standards with WHO recommendations aligns with the broader goals of the Air Quality Improvement sub-theme.

column2: Reach energy neutrality in the wastewater treatment sector by 2040
column5: This target is assigned to the Energy Neutrality sub-theme because it specifically mentions reaching energy neutrality. The target's focus on reducing greenhouse gas emissions aligns with the broader goals of the Energy Neutrality sub-theme.

column2: Each Member State shall ensure that the annual sum of its greenhouse gas emissions and removals on its territory and in all of the land reporting categories, in each year in the period from 2026 to 2030, does not exceed the limit established by a linear trajectory, ending in 2030 on the target set out for that Member State
column5: This target is assigned to the Greenhouse Gas Emissions Reduction sub-theme because it specifically mentions reducing greenhouse gas emissions. The target's focus on reducing emissions aligns with the broader goals of the Greenhouse Gas Emissions Reduction sub-theme.

column2: Renewable hydrogen will be key to replace natural gas, coal and oil in hard-to-decarbonise industries and transport
column5: This target is assigned to the Hydrogen Energy sub-theme because it specifically mentions renewable hydrogen. The target's focus on increasing the use of hydrogen energy aligns with the broader goals of the Hydrogen Energy sub-theme.
